sentences:
Montgomery " Scotty " Scott is a fictional character in the science fiction franchise Star Trek .
First portrayed by James Doohan in the , Scotty also appears in the , seven Star Trek movies , the episode " " , and in numerous books , comics , and video games .
Simon Pegg has assumed the character and appeared in the Star Trek reboot ( 2009 ) and its sequels , Star Trek Into Darkness ( 2013 ) and Star Trek Beyond ( 2016 ) .
Chris Doohan , son of James Doohan , has taken on the role of Scotty in the popular web series , Star Trek Continues .
Chris has also had roles in the J.J. Abrams films Star Trek and a credited appearance in Star Trek Into Darkness .
